text.paragraph: Person Co-ordinating Plan: Sharon Adamson, Social Worker, Hebburn Council, tel 0208 321 1212
Has a copy of the support plan been provided to the person? YesDate Provided: 19-Aug-2007

paragraph.content: Mr Jones will be helped to look after himself independently and to improve his mobility both indoors and out of doors. He will be referred to the falls clinic so that they can help identify how falls could be avoided in future. He will also be referred for support in managing his finances and to consider work options available.
Goals are to improve Mr Jones' independence and mobility and to help him to find employment and manage his finances better.

content.content: Can't independently shower, wash and dress and maintain personal self care without support

td.content:
Referral to Community Rehabilitation Service for daily visits to practice washing, dressing and using the shower (1 hour )
Provision of :
2x18" grab rails
27.5" slatted shower board
Adjustable height commode
Referral to Social care OT for consideration of major adaptations

content.content: Leaflet on easier to wear clothing.
Lacks confidence, affecting mobility indoors and preventing him from going out.

td.content: Independent and safe indoors in 3 months and some outdoor mobility in 6 months
Referral to Community Physiotherapy for weekly visits to practice walking and re-assessment of equipment / provision of equipment if required, including wheelchair for outdoor mobility

content.content: Not able to participate in paid work

td.content: Available options to have been discussed within one month
Referral to Disabled Access Worker at local Job Centre to offer consultation
Finances to be assessed within 8 weeks
Exercises as detailed in Community Rehabilitation exercise programme

text.paragraph: In emergency contact Sharon Adamson during office hours on 0208 321 1212 or call Emergency Duty Team out of hours 0208 321 0000
Mr Jones feels his strengths are his determination and good humour.
